entries.npc_1_1: I could use your help with this emergency, actually. A womp rat bit a local moisture farmer and the wound has become infected. The young woman waited too long to contact me, unfortunately, and I now I fear her condition may prevent her from making the journey safely. Could you make sure she does?
entries.npc_1_2: I could use your help in investigating the possible spread of this deadly disease. I need to perform an analysis of an infected womp rat. This will allow me to determine if the plague has mutated and requires a new vaccine. Do you think you can bring me an infected specimen's hide?
entries.npc_1_3: I was hoping you'd ask, citizen. I need to make sure this vaccine gets out to all the moisture farmers who may not have access to the cities. Could you deliver this supply to a representative of the Affiliated Moisture Farmers?
entries.npc_2_1: You are most gracious, citizen. She's transmitted her coordinates. She was attempting the trip on her own, but realized she might not make it. She's brave, but also a bit on the reckless side.
entries.npc_2_2: You are noble and good, citizen. I've taken the liberty of inoculating you against common Gray Rot with a modified bacta spray. This will keep you safe. If I determine that this is a new strain, I'll provide you the vaccine as soon as I develop it.
entries.npc_2_3: You are nothing if not reliable, citizen. Here you go. Make sure this gets to its destination as quickly as possible. Gray Rot can devastate a settlement in mere days.
entries.npc_3_1: It is regrettable that you choose not to help this young woman. If you'll excuse me, I need to find someone who will. Good day.
entries.npc_3_2: I would inoculate you against the common strain of Gray Rot, so I assure you you'd be safe. If after I've studied the specimen, I determine a new vaccine is needed, I'd provide you that as well. Please, these citizens need your help.
entries.npc_3_3: I must assume you're very busy. You do not seem to be the type of being that would stand idly by and watch dozens of innocents suffer a terrible fate. I'll find someone else to deliver the vaccine. Good day.
entries.npc_4_1: Her name is Maikeen Storn. She's only been on Tatooine for about a year. She's originally from Agamar, I believe. She's a brave young woman whose spirit I have come to admire. I hope you can help her
entries.npc_4_2: Gray Rot makes a victim's skin go scabrous and gray until it eventually cracks and ulcerates. Death follows a few agonizing days later. If caught in its early stages, it is treatable with bacta.
entries.npc_4_3: The man's name is Aroy Sekun, friend of the Darklighters, I believe. He's a responsible sort and will make sure that vaccine gets properly distributed.
entries.npc_reward_1: You have my thanks, citizen. You doubtless saved this woman's life. Now if you'll excuse me, I have work to do.
entries.npc_reward_2: Good work, citizen. I'll get right on this analysis. You may have just saved this city from a terrible epidemic. Check back with me to get a report of my findings.
entries.npc_reward_3: You've helped avert a catastrophe, friend. You have my thanks and the gratitude of the citizens of Tatooine. We have a new stimpack we've been working on. I don't have any pre-made packs at the moment, but here's the blueprint to make some if you're interested.
entries.player_1_2: If this will help cure others, I'll do it.  Yes.
entries.player_1_3: I'll make sure it gets to the right hands.
entries.player_2_1: It's not my fault she waited too long.  I'm too busy to help right now.
entries.player_2_2: No, that's not my field of work.  Sorry.
entries.player_2_3: You're better off hiring a courier.  I'm not interested.
entries.player_3_2: What exactly is Gray Rot Plague?
entries.player_reset_1: I've had something come up. I cannot escort her back here any more. Sorry.
entries.npc_backtowork_1: You will need to hurry.  If her infection is allowed to grow, I fear my skills will not be able to heal her.
entries.npc_reset_1: It is regrettable that you choose not to help this young woman. If you'll excuse me, I need to find someone who will. Good day.
entries.cantwork: I'm afraid my assignments would require your full attention, citizen. Medical issues should be top priority, after all. Please come back when you're free.
entries.dontknowyou_1: Thank you, but help is already on the way.
entries.npc_work_2: How goes your search for one of those pestilent womp rats?
entries.npc_work_3: Has that vaccine been given to the Moisture Farmers yet?
entries.npc_breech_1: Are you here to help me back to Doctor Melios?
entries.npc_breech_3: Oh, good!  You must be the one who has the vaccine.
entries.notit_2: No, this is not an infected womprat hide.
entries.npc_backtowork_2: Well, I wish you good luck.  As soon as I have that hide, I can begin working on a cure.
entries.npc_backtowork_3: Well, make sure they get it.  Their representative is still waiting for you.
entries.npc_reset_2: I would inoculate you against the common strain of Gray Rot, so I assure you you'd be safe. If after I've studied the specimen, I determine a new vaccine is needed, I'd provide you that as well. Please, these citizens need your help.
entries.npc_reset_3: I must assume you're very busy. You do not seem to be the type of being that would stand idly by and watch dozens of innocents suffer a terrible fate. I'll find someone else to deliver the vaccine. Good day.
entries.player_reset_2: I have second thoughts about this.  I don't want to get infected myself, so I have to decline.
entries.player_reset_3: I don't feel I should be the one to deliver this.  You might want to get someone else to do it.  Sorry.
entries.player_sorry_2: I have yet to find one, but I continue to search for one.
entries.player_sorry_3: No, not yet.  I'm in the process of taking it out to them.
entries.npc_takeme_1: Dr. Purl sent you, didn't he? Oh, all this fuss over me. Well, I appreciate your help. If I pass out, just slap me till I wake up.
entries.dontknowyou_3: I hope that vaccine gets here soon.  I've been waiting here all day.
entries.npc_smuggle_3: Thanks, friend. I'll make sure this gets to everyone who needs it. Dr. Purl has spoken highly of you. It was an honor and a pleasure to meet you. Take care.
entries.npc_work_1: Have you brought the farmer back yet?
entries.next: If I have any more medical emergencies I need help with, I'll be sure and ask for you.
entries.npc_failure_2: Now I don't know if we'll ever be able to stop the disease.
entries.npc_failure_3: I fear for our moisture farmers.  I wish you'd managed to get them the vaccine...
